long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
“Penalty Kick” is a thrilling soccer-themed game that puts your skills to the test. Whether you’re a seasoned soccer aficionado or a casual gamer, this game promises excitement, challenges, and competitive gameplay. Experience the adrenaline rush as you step into the shoes of a star striker, aiming to score against some of the toughest goalkeepers.

Game Controls
Mouse: To aim and shoot
Spacebar: To add spin to the ball (hold for power)
Arrow Keys: For minor adjustments in aim
Enter/Return Key: To confirm and proceed
How to Play
Aim Carefully: Use your mouse to aim where you want the ball to go.
Power Up: Hold down the spacebar to build up power for your shot. Release to kick the ball.
Spin it Right: Tap the spacebar once for a light spin, and hold for a more aggressive spin.
Score Goals: Try to get past the goalkeeper by predicting their movements and shooting in the opposite direction.
Progress Levels: As you score, the difficulty increases with faster goalkeepers and more challenging angles.

# Play more games on the top-left menu.
